text: Blanca de Silos (August 2, 1914 – September 13, 2002) was a Spanish film actress. She appeared in fifteen films, including playing the title role in Mariona Rebull (1947).San Miguel & Hortelano p.20 ==Selected filmography== * Raza (1942) * Intrigue (1942) * House of Cards (1943) * The House of Rain (1943) * Orosia (1944) * Mariona Rebull (1947) * Monsieur Robinson Crusoe (1960) == References == == Bibliography == * Helio San Miguel, Lorenzo J. Torres Hortelano. World Film Locations: Barcelona. Intellect Books, 2013. == External links == * Category:1914 births Category:2002 deaths Category:Spanish film actresses
title: Blanca de Silos
